entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the one who has returned after his departure. He is holding a sword and trying to explain how he found Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one being questioned by Ron about how he got there and how he found them.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's wand was picked up by Harry.

entities.name: harry's life
entities.description: Harry's life was saved by Ron.

entities.name: ron's departure
entities.description: Ron's departure is the subject of conversation between Harry and Ron.

entities.name: the sword
entities.description: The sword was found by Ron and shown to Harry.

entities.name: the forest
entities.description: The forest is a big place where Ron has been searching for hours.

entities.name: the deer
entities.description: A deer was seen by Ron which led him to Harry and Hermione.

relationships.description: Ron questioned Harry about how he got there and how he found them.
Ron was searching for Harry in the big forest.
Ron followed a deer which led him to Harry and Hermione.
